item.title: Plink is joining Google! PlinkArt Blog
item.description:
#“Plink is joining Google! \u0096 PlinkArt Blog”

We have some very exciting news Plink has just been acquired by Google.

via plinkart.com

I first encountered the Plink guys during the IQPrize. Whilst they didn't get the win, I confidently predicted they would be bought by Google or Microsoft in under 18 months.

Well they beat that by miles!

Fantastic news Mark and James. Totally deserved. Really really delighted for you both.
